verses.text: \w Let|strong="G3049"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w account|strong="G3049"\w* of \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* of the \w ministers|strong="G5257"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stewards|strong="G3623"\w* of the \w mysteries|strong="G3466"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G3063"\w* it is \w required|strong="G2212"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w stewards|strong="G3623"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* with \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w it|strong="G1519"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a very small \w thing|strong="G1646"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I should be \w judged|strong="G0350"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0442"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2250"\w*: \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, I \w judge|strong="G0350"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* mine own \w self|strong="G1683"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w know|strong="G4894"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* by \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*; \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* am \w I|strong="G1344"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w hereby|strong="G5129"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w judgeth|strong="G0350"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3361"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* will bring to \w light|strong="G5461"\w* the hidden \w things|strong="G2927"\w* of \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will make \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* the \w counsels|strong="G1012"\w* of the \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w shall|strong="G1096"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w have|strong="G1096"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, I have in a figure \w transferred|strong="G3345"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add to\add* \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* your \w sakes|strong="G5209"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w think|strong="G5426"\w* \add of men\add* \w above|strong="G5228"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of you be puffed \w up|strong="G5448"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w maketh|strong="G1252"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* to \w differ|strong="G1252"\w* \add from another\add*? \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* hast \w thou|strong="G2192"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w didst|strong="G2983"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w*? \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou didst \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \add it\add*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* dost thou \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*, as \w if|strong="G5613"\w* thou \w hadst|strong="G2983"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \add it\add*?

\w Now|strong="G2235"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w full|strong="G2880"\w*, \w now|strong="G2235"\w* ye are \w rich|strong="G4147"\w*, ye have reigned as \w kings|strong="G0936"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I would to \w God|strong="G3785"\w* ye did \w reign|strong="G0936"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* might \w reign|strong="G4821"\w* with \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath set \w forth|strong="G0584"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w*, as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* appointed to \w death|strong="G1935"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* we are \w made|strong="G1096"\w* a \w spectacle|strong="G2302"\w* unto the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \add are\add* \w fools|strong="G3474"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ’s sake|strong="G5547"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add are\add* \w wise|strong="G5429"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \add are\add* \w weak|strong="G0772"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add are\add* \w strong|strong="G2478"\w*; \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add are\add* \w honourable|strong="G1741"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \add are\add* \w despised|strong="G0820"\w*.

Even \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* this \w present|strong="G0737"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w we|strong="G3983"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w hunger|strong="G3983"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thirst|strong="G1372"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* are \w naked|strong="G1130"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* are \w buffeted|strong="G2852"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have no certain \w dwellingplace|strong="G0790"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w labour|strong="G2872"\w*, \w working|strong="G2038"\w* with our \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*: being \w reviled|strong="G3058"\w*, we \w bless|strong="G2127"\w*; being \w persecuted|strong="G1377"\w*, we suffer \w it|strong="G0430"\w*:

Being \w defamed|strong="G0987"\w*, we \w intreat|strong="G3870"\w*: we are \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w filth|strong="G4027"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \add and are\add* the \w offscouring|strong="G4067"\w* of all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* this \w day|strong="G0737"\w*.

I \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* to \w shame|strong="G1788"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w sons|strong="G5043"\w* I \w warn|strong="G3560"\w* \add you\add*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* ten \w thousand|strong="G3463"\w* \w instructers|strong="G3807"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* \add have ye\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* have \w begotten|strong="G1080"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*.
\w Wherefore|strong="G3767"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, be \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w followers|strong="G3402"\w* of \w me|strong="G3450"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* this \w cause|strong="G5124"\w* have I \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w son|strong="G5043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w bring|strong="G0363"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* into \w remembrance|strong="G0363"\w* of \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w ways|strong="G3598"\w* which \w be|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* I \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* every \w where|strong="G3837"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* are puffed \w up|strong="G5448"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G3450"\w* \w would|strong="G2064"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I will \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5030"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* of them \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are puffed \w up|strong="G5448"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* will \w ye|strong="G2309"\w*? shall I \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w rod|strong="G4464"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \add in\add* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w meekness|strong="G4236"\w*?
